form.official-title: To amend the Medicare, Medicaid, and SCHIP Extension Act of 2007 to make permanent the exemption of grandfathered long-term care hospitals from the Medicare 25 percent threshold payment adjustment.

section.header: Making permanent the exemption of grandfathered long-term care hospitals from the Medicare 25 percent patient threshold payment adjustment
section.text: Section 114(c)(1) of the Medicare, Medicaid, and SCHIP Extension Act of 2007 (42 U.S.C. 1395ww note), as amended by section 3106 of Public Law 111–148, is further amended—

paragraph.text: in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by striking for a 5-year period; and
in subparagraph (A), by inserting for a 5-year period, before section 412.536.
